meanings.definition: One of the types of teeth located between the canines and molars in humans.
meanings.sent1: My premolars help me chew my food.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined my premolars during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bit my tongue while trying to reach a stubborn piece of food with my premolars.
meanings.sent4: Her smile revealed a row of gleaming premolars, ready to tackle any meal.
meanings.sent5: The premolars in the back of my mouth are essential for breaking down tough foods.

meanings.definition: A tooth with two cusps or points used for grinding food.
meanings.sent1: The premolars in the back of my mouth are flat for grinding.
meanings.sent2: I can feel the texture of the food changing as it meets my premolars.
meanings.sent3: I joked that my premolars were like tiny food processors in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: His premolars worked tirelessly to crush the hard candy.
meanings.sent5: The premolars play a crucial role in the chewing process, breaking down food into smaller pieces.
